Today, Dan and Jordan follow up on Alex's coverage of the Buffalo shooting.  It turns out, it's mostly just still him falsely bragging about how he predicted it.

==Detailed Show Notes==

Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2022/5/19/episode-683-may-16-2022 Episode #683: May 16, 2022]</ref>:

*Alex continues to pretend that he predicted the Buffalo shooting
*Alex misrepresents information about [https://www.actionagainsthunger.org/world-hunger-facts-statistics people living with] [https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2021/11/8/un-warns-of-sharp-rise-in-number-of-people-facing-famine food insecurity]
*Chicago has the [https://www.cbsnews.com/pictures/murder-map-deadliest-u-s-cities/62/ 28th highest murder rate] in the country
*Alex uses [https://www.cbsnews.com/news/family-fbi-knew-oklahoma-bomb-plot-suspect-is-schizophrenic/ a 2017 article] about a guy in Oklahoma who wanted to bomb a bank to argue that the Buffalo shooter had schizophrenia
*[https://www.gofundme.com/f/well-never-forget-you-funeral-service-marcel GoFundMe for Marcel Fontaine]
